name: Church pavilion in Woodland, Utah
description: Woodland, Utah is a picturesque little town on the edge of the Uintah Mountains.  I camped on the concrete pad of a park pavilion of the local church.  My grandson joined me for the night and the next two days.  It got down to about 35 degrees at night.  No store or restaurant in the little town, so bring your own food.

location.description: 2830 E State Highway 35, Kamas, UT 84036, USA

comments: No overnight camping allowed, but no one kicked me out.  Got the tent up at sunset and down soon after sunrise.  I had the place mostly to myself.
